children.name: Test defects
TC690-Failed-->Reason: Error: element ("//android.widget.TextView[@text="To:"]/following-sibling::android.widget.EditText[1]") still not displayed after 10000ms
TC690 - To verify "Permalink icon" is not visible/present for only Gmail Inbox conversations.

TC706-Failed-->Reason: Error: element ("//android.widget.EditText[@text = "Compose"]") still not displayed after 10000ms
